note:
Geek. Gamer. Data hoarder. Eldritch Horror hidden in a geeky t-shirt. Reddit & Twitter Refugee. Canadian. Polite, but says the c word like an Australian. Avid pirate, worships unfathomable space gods that may drive you crazy. Bit of a mix!

Feel free to message me about geeky or weird shit! If you do and I don't reply...well something fucky is probably going on.
